mapper.select: select b.instrumenttypeid, b.instrumenttypename, c.instrumentconfigid, c.instrumentconfigname, a.lowlimit, a.highlimit, b.alarmtime from instrumentmonitor a left join monitorinstrumenttype b on a.instrumenttypeid = b.instrumenttypeid left join instrumentconfig c on a.instrumentconfigid = c.instrumentconfigid where a.instrumenttypeid = #{instrumenttypeid}
